Interchangeable Straps - Enjoy the freedom to switch up your look with two interchangeable straps included. From a classic leather strap for a timeless feel to a trendy woven chain strap, adapt your fanny pack to suit your mood and outfit. Multi-functional Woven Chain Strap - The woven chain strap isn't just for wearing around your waist. Elevate your style by using it as a decorative chain, adding a touch of sophistication to any ensemble. Versatility Meets Trend - Whether you're on the go or hitting the town, this Quilted Leather Fanny Pack is designed to keep up with your dynamic lifestyle. The adjustable straps ensure a comfortable fit, allowing you to wear it as a traditional fanny pack or across your body for added flair.Chic and Practical - Transition effortlessly from day to night with a fanny pack that complements your every move. The quilted leather and interchangeable straps make it a versatile accessory that effortlessly enhances your personal style. products.name: Stivali New York Pijao Mules In Black Leather
products.brandedName: Stivali New York Pijao Mules In Black Leather
products.unbrandedName: Stivali New York Pijao Mules In Black Leather
products.description: Slip into this easy and comfortable mule this season. Featuring a soft footbed and a pointed toe design the cut out in the front will elongate your legs and have you ready for any day.  Ethically Handmade in Colombia By Stivali New York Materials Upper smooth Manhattan leather Rubber outsole Features Semi rounded toe Triangular cut out Contrast color heel bed Smooth leather wrapped heel Close toed slip on mule Measurements Heel Height: 1. 2" Arch Circumference: 9. 49" Foot Width: 3. 41" All measurements are based on a size 38 shoe. There may be slight measurement variations based on size Each pair of shoes is handcrafted by our artisans on our atelier in Colombia. Your purchase supports their families to improve their quality of life. Cattle leathers have beauty marks/freckles/moles/scars, just as we do. In part, that is also the beauty of leather, each piece is unique, special and has history. As we share in the following video: https://youtu. be/Oy6R3J_1YSA That said, the leathers we use are a by product of the food industry. Here at Stivali, style and comfort are undoubtedly important in our design process but they do not rank highest in our curation process. Maintaining an ethical mindset is always the biggest inspiration behind our collections. The way in which Stivali weaves sustainability and design into stylish footwear is always with consideration of our morals, the environment and you. Everything starts with our materials. We have worked with 100% Colombian leather since our beginnings in 1998 and continue to choose authentic leather over faux alternatives. The debate over vegan and synthetic leather has been long and confused, straying away from the truth of the matter: vegan leather comes at a significant environmental cost. Polyurethane and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) undergoes an intensive chemical process in effort to mimic leather. Both plastics require plactizers and phthalates (which are harmful and toxic) and are derived from fossil fuels, releasing nitrogen and carbon into the atmosphere. In addition, both plastics take hundreds of years to biodegrade and are more likely to end up in landfills as their quality worsens quicker. Fashion brands are quick to green-wash vegan leathers as a sustainable alternative to their buyers, as even the word vegan ignites an association to the diet and lifestyle. Genuine leathers are natural products of the planet and therefore biodegrade entirely and much quicker. A by-product of the food industry, our leathers are a solution to wasted materials rather than a new addition to an on-going problem. From the beginning design phases to our showroom to their new owner, we make sure to carefully curate an ethical experience. After choosing your favorite new booties, theyll be wrapped in entirely biodegradable packaging and a portion of each purchase will be donated to a charity of your choosing. For every pair of shoes, we want to ensure our customer transparency and as little environmental impact as possible. At Stivali, we not only strive to cater elevated footwear but ease our carbon footprint as well. Stivali handcrafts women footwear and accessories in Colombia at the Guarin familys atelier. Where quality is treasured, along with a revived appreciation into traditional skills. Handcrafting shoes to last generations. Stivali believes that footwear should be both, sophisticated in form and ethical to wear. Thus, the brand is proud to honor family values. The way Stivali honors families legacies is by offering products and services conceived in family, revealing our operations transparently, and by creating aspirational yet attainable and wearable collections.

About the designer: SAINT LAURENT has been influencing and revolutionizing the fashion industry since the debut of its iconic Rive Gauche collection in 1966 - the couture house was the first to create a ready-to-wear capsule. The sleek, precisely tailored staples, like the signature biker jackets, transcend seasons and trends. Creative Director Anthony Vaccarello continues to honor the labels illustrious reputation by reintroducing cult styles, including the Lou handbag and Tribute sandals.
